Install dependencies
```{r}
library(devtools)
install.packages("PerformanceAnalytics", dependencies=TRUE)
library("PerformanceAnalytics")
install_github("vqv/ggbiplot")
library(ggbiplot)
```

## 1. **Univariate analysis**



```{r}
data_source = data.frame(read.csv("train.csv", header=T))
summary(data_source)
```

## Numeric variables distribution
***

### Age

```{r}
hist(data_source$Age, xlab="Age", main="Age distribution")

```
### Fare

```{r}
hist(data_source$Fare, xlab="Fare", main="Fare distribution")
```

## Categorical variables distribution
***

### Ticket class


```{r}
frequency = table(data_source$Pclass)
barplot(frequency, xlab="Ticket class", ylab="Frequency", main="Ticket distribution")
```

## 2. **Multivariate analysis**

```{r}
my_data <- data_source[, c(6,7,8,10)]
chart.Correlation(my_data, histogram=TRUE, pch=19, method=c("pearson"))
```

##Principal Component Analysis

```{r}
pca = prcomp(~ ., data=data_source[, c(3,6,7,8,10)], center = TRUE,scale. = TRUE, na.action=na.omit)
summary(pca)
ggbiplot(pca)
```
